plain: 12 Monkeys, The Shawshank Redemption, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, A Close Shave, Trainspotting, 2001: A Space Odyssey, The Matrix, SLC Punk!, Election, Fight Club, Time Bandits, Being John Malkovich, The Fisher King, Mad Max, and Best in Show are all examples of science fiction, fantasy, and action movies. Babe, The Usual Suspects, Jeffrey, Bullets Over Broadway, Good Will Hunting, Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, Pi, L.A. Story, Pleasantville, Office Space, Total Recall, Hard Boiled, El Mariachi, and Citizen Ruth are all examples of drama, comedy, and thriller movies. The Godfather Part II is an example of a crime drama. A Clockwork Orange is an example of a dystopian fiction. Hype! is an example of a documentary. Waiting for Guffman is an example of a mockumentary. The Fifth Element is an example of a science fiction action film. Schizopolis is an example of a psychological thriller. Election is an example of a political drama. Terminator Salvation is an example of a science fiction action film.
